name: Scheherazade's Journey
description:
Scheherazade's Journey is a 3D-Puzzle-Platformer. It was made within a week for the Winter 2020 A8 Game Jam under the theme Keep It Alive.

You play as Scheherazade, who tries to bring a magical plant to her home village to rescue her people from a deadly disease. But the plant is very sensitive and dries up quickly. So hurry up to solve the puzzles and find Oases to water the plant.

W - move forward
S - move backward
A - move left
D - move right
space - jump
F - interact

Or you can use a gamepad to control the game. Unfortunately it is not possible to rebind keys by now.
